MonsterTrait.Name: Spider Climb
MonsterTrait.Text: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

MonsterTrait.Name: Leap
MonsterTrait.Text: The steeder can expend all its movement on its turn to jump up to 60 feet vertically or horizontally, provided that is speed is at least 30 feet.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MonsterAction.Name: Sticky Leg (Recharges when the Steeder Has No Creatures Grappled
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Small or Tiny creature. Hit: The target is stuck ot the steeder's leg and grappled until it escapes (escape DC 12)
